style.description: Changes that do not affect the business logic of the code. (example: CSS, typos, small template fixes)
style.title: Styles

refactor.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
refactor.title: Code Refactoring

test.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
test.title: Tests

build.description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: webpack, angularCLI, npm)
build.title: Builds

ci.description: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Jenkinsfile)
ci.title: Continuous Integrations

chore.description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
chore.title: Chores
